## Biography

Dr. Thomas Frost is a clinical doctor currently studying for his PhD with the [UKRI UCL Centre for Doctoral Training in AI-enabled Healthcare Systems](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/aihealth-cdt/). His current work is looking at applying Reinforcement Learning algorithms to optimise IV infusions in Critical Care at UCLH. 

He recently completed his Master of Research thesis in 2022, which identified ventilatory temporal phenotypes in patients with COVID-19-related ARDS using Hidden Markov Models. Prior to this, he was working in Scotland as a junior doctor.
